summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Gents of London Design Paste Matt Firm Hold Professional Hair Styling Wax (3 oz) Review Date: 2020/02/23 Store: GENTS OF LONDON Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Hair Type': 'All', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Liquid Volume': '3 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Wax', 'Brand': 'GENTS OF LONDON'} Review Text: This hair paste is awesome! for the price, it almost even out performs some way more expensive hair products! I used to use Paul Mitchell hair paste, but this is probably going to be my go to now.

This stuff does have somewhat of a smell, but it smells sort of like the original old spice. It's not too strong though, but if you want something scentless, then you may wanna try something else. Review Title: Smells Kinda like Old Spice Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Sdara Aloe Vera Gel For Face and Body - Organic & Natural, Soothing & Cooling For Sunburn Relief, Restorative For Dry Skin - Made In USA Review Date: 2020/06/26 Store: Sdara Skincare Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Sdara Skincare', 'Scent': 'Aloe Vera', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '4.9 x 2.3 x 1.3 inches; 9.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '707486993085'} Review Text: Seriously there’s nothing better on a sunburn than Aloe Vera. It’s natural and won’t harm your skin. This aloe has a clear color so there’s no artificial dyes contained in this gel. Just pure headlining and soothing properties. I feel for the size of the bottle, it’s a great bargain and it’s effective. Review Title: Cooling Natural Aloe Vera Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 3D Mask Bracket - Internal Support Holder Frame Nose Breathing Smoothly- Lipstick Protection Cool Mask Bracket - DIY Face Mask Accessories - 5Pcs (L-Adult) Review Date: 2020/09/01 Store: Vedory Product Description: ['❤-Outfits Set Include: 1 pack of 5 3D mask bracket (not including mask or cloth, etc.). ❤-Size: about 10*9*4.2cm / 3.9*3.51*1.64 inches, enough space for various masks. ❤-Unique design: designed to fit the face of the nose bridge, breathing more smoothly, breathable and not stuffy. ❤-Ideal Saver for Makeup - It makes the mask not to stick lipstick, protecting your perfect makeup from being messed up.If you wear glasses, 3D Inner Bracket can also prevent the lens from fogging because of more breathing space. ❤ 3D Inner Bracket also suitable for various ma-sks.Using double sided tape or thread to fasten the silicone frame onto the mask can make it work better.'] Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '6.3 x 4.72 x 2.36 inches; 1.41 Ounces', 'UPC': '800914455053', 'Manufacturer': 'Vedory'} Review Text: These really do help to make wearing a mask a little easier to breathe. I don't like wearing mine and I don't have to for very long, but this does help with air circulation underneath your mask. If you're having a hard time, give these a try. They are a great value and seem to be very sturdy. Review Title: Mask Brackets Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Zeitun Natural Anti Cellulite Body Scrub - Organic Coffee Body Scrub Exfoliator With Robusta & Dead Sea Salt - Cinnamon, Ginger And Moisturizing Oils, 7 oz Review Date: 2020/09/19 Store: Zeitun Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.57 x 5.91 x 8.27 inches; 7 Ounces'} Review Text: I didn't notice a distinct fragrance from this scrub. It does faintly smell of coffee but I had hoped there would be more of a spicy smell. But, this is a nice feeling scrub against your skin. It does make your skin feel energized. I'm not sure how long it would take to make my cellulite become less visible but I will keep using it for the mere purpose that it does feel good. I would say too that it would make a good gift because it's so unique. I do recommend this product and for the price it's a good value for either a gift or keeping it for yourself as a treat. Enjoy! Review Title: Coffee Scrub Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Reusable Makeup Remover Pads| Dual- Texture Soft Reusable Face Microfiber Rounds For Mascara, Eye Shadow, Lipstick, Foundation (3 Pads+ Makeup Headband +Laundry Bag) Review Date: 2020/09/23 Store: TECHEALTH Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '11 x 7.5 x 2 inches; 2.82 Ounces', 'UPC': '860002480299'} Review Text: If you are concerned about the environment and like a simple way to remove your makeup, these are for you! You use these microfiber pads once and you can wash them in a bag that is provided for you in this pouch. It couldn't be easier or better for our environment. I feel this would make an excellent gift for someone as well. Everything you need is all included in this ziplock pouch. It's a big savings financially to have pads that can be washed and reused over and over again. I think you'll enjoy this product very much. Review Title: Reusable Makeup Removal Pads with Laundry bag Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Rancco Dried Flower Buds Fragrant Petals Ball, 10 Kinds Natural Organic Flowers Ball, Premium Grade Dried Blooming Flower Tea Balls for Tea, Baking or Bath Bombs Review Date: 2021/01/05 Store: Rancco Average Rating: 3.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Rancco', 'Scent': 'Honey, Rose, Lily', 'Material Feature': 'Vegan', 'Unit Count': '10.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '10', 'Package Dimensions': '9.49 x 6.26 x 1.1 inches; 3.88 Ounces'} Review Text: I want to explain why I didn't give this neat product a better rating. First let me say that I do like the idea - i love it in fact. I was so excited about receiving this product because it was so different and unique. I wanted to learn how to use this product in different ways. When I received it, I got the bag as pictured above and couldn't figure out what was inside. There was no description on the outside at all. I didn't know what was inside till I ripped the bag open. After I opened it, I immediately saw the beautifully colored foil wrapped buds and remembered "Oh yes, this is the flower buds that I saw that can be used as tea, bath pods and for baking." There was no description, instructions or anything inside other than the beautifully foil wrapped buds. I'm still left wondering how I will use them. If I use for tea, I suppose I just wing it and drink the tea when I think it's done as there's no recipe for how long to steep to experience the perfect amount of flavor is extracted. If I use for a bath, I'm sure there would be much more flexibility but it also advertises you can use for baking. I have no idea how to use it for that. If I wanted to use it for a gift, it would be incomplete not to mention that in order to even know what I ordered, I had to already open the pretty bag so that would ruin the presentation. I feel this is a great product with great potential to be a high end gift or luxury indulgence. They just have one more step to complete in the way of instructions and explanation on the packaging to make it achieve it's potential. This idea could easily go viral and become very popular. Review Title: Dried Flower Buds Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Kneipp Body Lotion (Lavender) Review Date: 2021/02/22 Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Kneipp', 'Scent': 'Lavender', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Active Ingredients': 'lavender,vitamin a', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '5.2 x 2.72 x 13.7 inches; 7.05 Ounces'} Review Text: I love that this is Vegan! It's got good things for your skin other than the relaxing qualities of Lavender. It's got Vitamin A and Almond Oil in this lotion. It comes out very thick and creamy. The scent is amazing too. It is very calming for you and I'd suggest using it right before bed. It's just the ticket to a good sleep regimen. You will love this lotion as much as I do I'm certain of it! Review Title: Lavender Lotion Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Calendula Soap With Coconut Oil Soap - Natural Body Soap | Best Body Bar For Dry & Sensitive Skin | Use As A Bath Soap & Face Pure Extracts (2.64 Ounce) Review Date: 2021/03/15 Store: Pure Extracts Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Brand': 'Pure Extracts', 'Scent': 'Calendula', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '3.23 x 2.2 x 1.34 inches; 4.16 Ounces'} Review Text: It's got to be the Calendula oil that leaves your skin so moisturized after using this soap. I first smelled the very subtle fragrance and thought I'd enjoy this soap enough to purchase it again till I also realized it's really moisturizing. I think you'll be very happy with how it leaves your skin feeling most of all. It's advertised as being all natural as well so if you have sensitive skin, you shouldn't have any problems with this although I'd always recommend trying a test patch first before using it in the shower all over. Review Title: Bar of Soap with Calendula Oil Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: magicopper Face Masks with strap, Breathable Face Mask special 2 Layer Facemask, Lightweight Facial Masks for Adult, Men, Women, Indoor, Outdoor Use Review Date: 2021/04/30 Store: magicopper Average Rating: 3.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Magicopper', 'Material': 'Copper', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Pattern': 'Solid', 'Size': '1 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Ply Rating': '2 ply', 'Style': 'Earloop', 'Closure Type': 'Ear Loop', 'Reusability': 'Reusable', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Product Dimensions': '1 x 8.3 x 6 inches; 1.45 Ounces', 'UPC': '792279090133', 'Manufacturer': 'magicopper'} Review Text: I wasn't sure what to expect when this arrive but I was pleasantly surprised at how breathable this mask is. It's more formed and cone shaped on it's own which allows a breathing space between your face and the mask itself. This makes this mask so easy to breath with. I'm not used to using masks since I spend more time at home but when I do go out, I want a mask that doesn't make me feel like I'm struggling for breath. This is the mask for you! It not only is very safe and the harder shell surface will keep germs out, it's also a nice breathable mask. The price is extremely fair as well. It comes with a lanyard so you don't have to put your mask down on any dirty surface when not in use. It can hang from your neck comfortably. The inside of the mask is washable so you can use it again and again without fear. Review Title: Magicopper Film Mask Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Cuticle & Nail Care Set 3pcs - Stainless Steel Cuticle Nippers, Cuticle Pusher And Scraper To Remove Gel Nail - Nail Art Remover Tool, Manicure Tools (Silver) Review Date: 2021/05/12 Store: Heisey Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '6.61 x 2.56 x 0.59 inches; 2.47 Ounces', 'UPC': '793811542271'} Review Text: I ordered this mainly for the cutters. This cuticle nipper has a double tension resistance and is easy to maneuver. I like to keep my nails and cuticles looking good. It's important to have the right quality tools. This kit has the basics and the price is right. Each item seems to be of high quality steel and feels good in your hand making them an easy way to keep your manicure and pedicure looking good. Review Title: Nail Care Cuticle Nippers and accessories Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Little Moon Essentials Floral Bath & Shower Sugar Exfoliant, Relax, 2 oz. Review Date: 2021/06/08 Store: Little Moon Essentials Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Little Moon Essentials', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Product Benefits': 'Exfoliating', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Material Type Free': 'preservative free,paraben free', 'Package Dimensions': '2.2 x 2.2 x 1.3 inches; 2 Ounces', 'UPC': '673673882459'} Review Text: This has a very pleasant scent and works quite well at exfoliating and moisturizing your skin. I think the scent is a bit on the stronger side but it's pleasant and is more like something you'd smell in a spa for relaxation. It's a small size tin so use sparingly. A little goes a long way. You will enjoy this little luxury very much. It's a great value as well as a fun thing to use or gift to a friend. Review Title: Sugar Scrub Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 2PCS Portable Electric Toothbrush Travel Case, Plastic Travel Toothbrush Container Holder Suitable for Oral-B, Philips Sonicare and Other Electric Toothbrush Set (Black and White) Review Date: 2021/09/26 Store: Hovesty Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '9.84 x 5.59 x 1.73 inches; 6.38 Ounces', 'UPC': '664935369078'} Review Text: These toothbrush cases are a good size and you can fit your electric toothbrush inside easily if you remove the brush stem. They won't rattle around in there because they have grooves where the brush and stem both can easily fit inside and clip into place. The reason I gave these a 3 star rating was because the clip that is to keep the case closed doesn't really clamp or close right. It's very loose and I think that you will need a rubber band to keep the case closed. I know that's not really a big deal but given that I haven't even used these yet I can't blame wear and tear on the fact that the clasp doesn't work. It didn't work from the moment I took it out of the box. I suppose if you put this case inside a toiletry bag, it's unlikely it will open even without a rubber band so really, if you need something to pack up your electric toothbrush, these cases will work and hold most brands of electric toothbrush and the price was fair. Review Title: Travel Electric Toothbrush Case Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: FERYES Makeup Sponge Holder with Makeup Sponge– Eco-Friendly Silicone Beauty Make Up Blender Case and Dry & Wet Use Foundation Sponge for Travel - Khaki (MS Khaki) Review Date: 2021/10/27 Store: FERYES Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'FERYES', 'Color': '(MS Khaki)', 'Material': 'Silicone', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Makeup', 'Package Dimensions': '3.19 x 2.48 x 2.44 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'LEYIX', 'Country of Origin': 'China'} Review Text: One issue I've had in my makeup drawer is that I hate to just put my blender sponge in there without being inside something to keep it clean and sanitary. This solves that problem nicely. It's very soft and pliable and opens with a squeeze of the ends of the container. It's very easy to use and your sponge fits nicely inside. It seems quite durable and like it would last a good long time. It's also easy to clean and allows circulation in case you wash your sponge and it's slightly damp. The air holes will allow for proper circulation. This is a really handy gadget! Review Title: Makeup Sponge Holder Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Peripera Ink Mood Matte Lipstick, Lightweight, Matte, Smooth, Hydrating, Lasting Color Payoff (02 Pink Go Up) Review Date: 2021/11/10 Store: Peripera Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Peripera', 'Color': '02 PINK GO UP', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Item Form': 'Crayon', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Package Dimensions': '3.46 x 0.94 x 0.87 inches; 1.06 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'CLIO'} Review Text: I really love this color and the feel of this lipstick. I was impressed too with how pretty the packaging was. There's nothing nicer than when you take your lipstick out of your purse and everyone sees how pretty the tube is - but I digress. This lipstick is a great nude color and goes well with just about anything I wear - be it red or pink. You must always have a good versatile lipstick color in your purse at all times. Your clothes change but you always take the same purse when you're out and about. Your lipstick in that purse should go with everything you're wearing. The feel of this lipstick is also very nice which is a huge plus. I think the price is fair for such a nice quality lipstick. Review Title: Nice feel and Great Color Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: ANGNYA 6Pcs Nail Art Brushes Set Gel Nail Polish Design Pen Painting Tools With Nail Extension Gel Brushs,Builder Gel Brush,Nail Art Liner Brush for Salon at Home DIY Manicure(Pink) Review Date: 2021/12/22 Store: ANGNYA Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'ANGNYA', 'Head Material': 'Nylon', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '9.53 x 3.7 x 0.98 inches; 3.84 Ounces'} Review Text: This particular kit of nail art brushes had a good variety of different size brush heads. I've got other kits and they tend to all either be really thin or larger. This is a good kit to have because it's got a nice cross section of sizes to choose from. I wanted a particular size to make snowflakes on my nails with snow dots and I can do both designs with this one kit. I'm very happy with this section of brushes and the cost value too. Review Title: Great Variety of Sizes Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

Makeup Sponge Holder Peripera Ink Mood Matte Lipstick, Lightweight, Matte, Smooth, Hydrating, Lasting Color Payoff (02 Pink Go Up) Peripera {'Brand': 'Peripera', 'Color': '02 PINK GO UP', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Item Form': 'Crayon', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Package Dimensions': '3.46 x 0.94 x 0.87 inches; 1.06 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'CLIO'} I really love this color and the feel of this lipstick. prompt:
Based on this purchase history, analyze and summarize this person's genuine preferences and patterns in under 256 words. Think step by step: 1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments 2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases 3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns 4. Finally, synthesize these observations into core preferences Remember to: - Focus only on keywords and trends supported by multiple interactions - Avoid repeating specific product names or details - Base conclusions strictly on the provided purchase data Here's the purchase data: === Purchase Information === Product Title: Gents of London Design Paste Matt Firm Hold Professional Hair Styling Wax (3 oz) Review Date: 2020/02/23 Store: GENTS OF LONDON Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Hair Type': 'All', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Liquid Volume': '3 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Wax', 'Brand': 'GENTS OF LONDON'} Review Text: This hair paste is awesome! for the price, it almost even out performs some way more expensive hair products! I used to use Paul Mitchell hair paste, but this is probably going to be my go to now.

This stuff does have somewhat of a smell, but it smells sort of like the original old spice. It's not too strong though, but if you want something scentless, then you may wanna try something else. Review Title: Smells Kinda like Old Spice Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Sdara Aloe Vera Gel For Face and Body - Organic & Natural, Soothing & Cooling For Sunburn Relief, Restorative For Dry Skin - Made In USA Review Date: 2020/06/26 Store: Sdara Skincare Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Sdara Skincare', 'Scent': 'Aloe Vera', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '4.9 x 2.3 x 1.3 inches; 9.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '707486993085'} Review Text: Seriously there’s nothing better on a sunburn than Aloe Vera. It’s natural and won’t harm your skin. This aloe has a clear color so there’s no artificial dyes contained in this gel. Just pure headlining and soothing properties. I feel for the size of the bottle, it’s a great bargain and it’s effective. Review Title: Cooling Natural Aloe Vera Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 3D Mask Bracket - Internal Support Holder Frame Nose Breathing Smoothly- Lipstick Protection Cool Mask Bracket - DIY Face Mask Accessories - 5Pcs (L-Adult) Review Date: 2020/09/01 Store: Vedory Product Description: ['❤-Outfits Set Include: 1 pack of 5 3D mask bracket (not including mask or cloth, etc.). ❤-Size: about 10*9*4.2cm / 3.9*3.51*1.64 inches, enough space for various masks. ❤-Unique design: designed to fit the face of the nose bridge, breathing more smoothly, breathable and not stuffy. ❤-Ideal Saver for Makeup - It makes the mask not to stick lipstick, protecting your perfect makeup from being messed up.If you wear glasses, 3D Inner Bracket can also prevent the lens from fogging because of more breathing space. ❤ 3D Inner Bracket also suitable for various ma-sks.Using double sided tape or thread to fasten the silicone frame onto the mask can make it work better.'] Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '6.3 x 4.72 x 2.36 inches; 1.41 Ounces', 'UPC': '800914455053', 'Manufacturer': 'Vedory'} Review Text: These really do help to make wearing a mask a little easier to breathe. I don't like wearing mine and I don't have to for very long, but this does help with air circulation underneath your mask. If you're having a hard time, give these a try. They are a great value and seem to be very sturdy. Review Title: Mask Brackets Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Zeitun Natural Anti Cellulite Body Scrub - Organic Coffee Body Scrub Exfoliator With Robusta & Dead Sea Salt - Cinnamon, Ginger And Moisturizing Oils, 7 oz Review Date: 2020/09/19 Store: Zeitun Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.57 x 5.91 x 8.27 inches; 7 Ounces'} Review Text: I didn't notice a distinct fragrance from this scrub. It does faintly smell of coffee but I had hoped there would be more of a spicy smell. But, this is a nice feeling scrub against your skin. It does make your skin feel energized. I'm not sure how long it would take to make my cellulite become less visible but I will keep using it for the mere purpose that it does feel good. I would say too that it would make a good gift because it's so unique. I do recommend this product and for the price it's a good value for either a gift or keeping it for yourself as a treat. Enjoy! Review Title: Coffee Scrub Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Reusable Makeup Remover Pads| Dual- Texture Soft Reusable Face Microfiber Rounds For Mascara, Eye Shadow, Lipstick, Foundation (3 Pads+ Makeup Headband +Laundry Bag) Review Date: 2020/09/23 Store: TECHEALTH Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '11 x 7.5 x 2 inches; 2.82 Ounces', 'UPC': '860002480299'} Review Text: If you are concerned about the environment and like a simple way to remove your makeup, these are for you! You use these microfiber pads once and you can wash them in a bag that is provided for you in this pouch. It couldn't be easier or better for our environment. I feel this would make an excellent gift for someone as well. Everything you need is all included in this ziplock pouch. It's a big savings financially to have pads that can be washed and reused over and over again. I think you'll enjoy this product very much. Review Title: Reusable Makeup Removal Pads with Laundry bag Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Rancco Dried Flower Buds Fragrant Petals Ball, 10 Kinds Natural Organic Flowers Ball, Premium Grade Dried Blooming Flower Tea Balls for Tea, Baking or Bath Bombs Review Date: 2021/01/05 Store: Rancco Average Rating: 3.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Rancco', 'Scent': 'Honey, Rose, Lily', 'Material Feature': 'Vegan', 'Unit Count': '10.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '10', 'Package Dimensions': '9.49 x 6.26 x 1.1 inches; 3.88 Ounces'} Review Text: I want to explain why I didn't give this neat product a better rating. First let me say that I do like the idea - i love it in fact. I was so excited about receiving this product because it was so different and unique. I wanted to learn how to use this product in different ways. When I received it, I got the bag as pictured above and couldn't figure out what was inside. There was no description on the outside at all. I didn't know what was inside till I ripped the bag open. After I opened it, I immediately saw the beautifully colored foil wrapped buds and remembered "Oh yes, this is the flower buds that I saw that can be used as tea, bath pods and for baking." There was no description, instructions or anything inside other than the beautifully foil wrapped buds. I'm still left wondering how I will use them. If I use for tea, I suppose I just wing it and drink the tea when I think it's done as there's no recipe for how long to steep to experience the perfect amount of flavor is extracted. If I use for a bath, I'm sure there would be much more flexibility but it also advertises you can use for baking. I have no idea how to use it for that. If I wanted to use it for a gift, it would be incomplete not to mention that in order to even know what I ordered, I had to already open the pretty bag so that would ruin the presentation. I feel this is a great product with great potential to be a high end gift or luxury indulgence. They just have one more step to complete in the way of instructions and explanation on the packaging to make it achieve it's potential. This idea could easily go viral and become very popular. Review Title: Dried Flower Buds Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Kneipp Body Lotion (Lavender) Review Date: 2021/02/22 Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Kneipp', 'Scent': 'Lavender', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Active Ingredients': 'lavender,vitamin a', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '5.2 x 2.72 x 13.7 inches; 7.05 Ounces'} Review Text: I love that this is Vegan! It's got good things for your skin other than the relaxing qualities of Lavender. It's got Vitamin A and Almond Oil in this lotion. It comes out very thick and creamy. The scent is amazing too. It is very calming for you and I'd suggest using it right before bed. It's just the ticket to a good sleep regimen. You will love this lotion as much as I do I'm certain of it! Review Title: Lavender Lotion Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Calendula Soap With Coconut Oil Soap - Natural Body Soap | Best Body Bar For Dry & Sensitive Skin | Use As A Bath Soap & Face Pure Extracts (2.64 Ounce) Review Date: 2021/03/15 Store: Pure Extracts Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Brand': 'Pure Extracts', 'Scent': 'Calendula', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '3.23 x 2.2 x 1.34 inches; 4.16 Ounces'} Review Text: It's got to be the Calendula oil that leaves your skin so moisturized after using this soap. I first smelled the very subtle fragrance and thought I'd enjoy this soap enough to purchase it again till I also realized it's really moisturizing. I think you'll be very happy with how it leaves your skin feeling most of all. It's advertised as being all natural as well so if you have sensitive skin, you shouldn't have any problems with this although I'd always recommend trying a test patch first before using it in the shower all over. Review Title: Bar of Soap with Calendula Oil Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: magicopper Face Masks with strap, Breathable Face Mask special 2 Layer Facemask, Lightweight Facial Masks for Adult, Men, Women, Indoor, Outdoor Use Review Date: 2021/04/30 Store: magicopper Average Rating: 3.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Magicopper', 'Material': 'Copper', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Pattern': 'Solid', 'Size': '1 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Ply Rating': '2 ply', 'Style': 'Earloop', 'Closure Type': 'Ear Loop', 'Reusability': 'Reusable', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Product Dimensions': '1 x 8.3 x 6 inches; 1.45 Ounces', 'UPC': '792279090133', 'Manufacturer': 'magicopper'} Review Text: I wasn't sure what to expect when this arrive but I was pleasantly surprised at how breathable this mask is. It's more formed and cone shaped on it's own which allows a breathing space between your face and the mask itself. This makes this mask so easy to breath with. I'm not used to using masks since I spend more time at home but when I do go out, I want a mask that doesn't make me feel like I'm struggling for breath. This is the mask for you! It not only is very safe and the harder shell surface will keep germs out, it's also a nice breathable mask. The price is extremely fair as well. It comes with a lanyard so you don't have to put your mask down on any dirty surface when not in use. It can hang from your neck comfortably. The inside of the mask is washable so you can use it again and again without fear. Review Title: Magicopper Film Mask Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Cuticle & Nail Care Set 3pcs - Stainless Steel Cuticle Nippers, Cuticle Pusher And Scraper To Remove Gel Nail - Nail Art Remover Tool, Manicure Tools (Silver) Review Date: 2021/05/12 Store: Heisey Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '6.61 x 2.56 x 0.59 inches; 2.47 Ounces', 'UPC': '793811542271'} Review Text: I ordered this mainly for the cutters. This cuticle nipper has a double tension resistance and is easy to maneuver. I like to keep my nails and cuticles looking good. It's important to have the right quality tools. This kit has the basics and the price is right. Each item seems to be of high quality steel and feels good in your hand making them an easy way to keep your manicure and pedicure looking good. Review Title: Nail Care Cuticle Nippers and accessories Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Little Moon Essentials Floral Bath & Shower Sugar Exfoliant, Relax, 2 oz. Review Date: 2021/06/08 Store: Little Moon Essentials Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Little Moon Essentials', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Product Benefits': 'Exfoliating', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Material Type Free': 'preservative free,paraben free', 'Package Dimensions': '2.2 x 2.2 x 1.3 inches; 2 Ounces', 'UPC': '673673882459'} Review Text: This has a very pleasant scent and works quite well at exfoliating and moisturizing your skin. I think the scent is a bit on the stronger side but it's pleasant and is more like something you'd smell in a spa for relaxation. It's a small size tin so use sparingly. A little goes a long way. You will enjoy this little luxury very much. It's a great value as well as a fun thing to use or gift to a friend. Review Title: Sugar Scrub Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 2PCS Portable Electric Toothbrush Travel Case, Plastic Travel Toothbrush Container Holder Suitable for Oral-B, Philips Sonicare and Other Electric Toothbrush Set (Black and White) Review Date: 2021/09/26 Store: Hovesty Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '9.84 x 5.59 x 1.73 inches; 6.38 Ounces', 'UPC': '664935369078'} Review Text: These toothbrush cases are a good size and you can fit your electric toothbrush inside easily if you remove the brush stem. They won't rattle around in there because they have grooves where the brush and stem both can easily fit inside and clip into place. The reason I gave these a 3 star rating was because the clip that is to keep the case closed doesn't really clamp or close right. It's very loose and I think that you will need a rubber band to keep the case closed. I know that's not really a big deal but given that I haven't even used these yet I can't blame wear and tear on the fact that the clasp doesn't work. It didn't work from the moment I took it out of the box. I suppose if you put this case inside a toiletry bag, it's unlikely it will open even without a rubber band so really, if you need something to pack up your electric toothbrush, these cases will work and hold most brands of electric toothbrush and the price was fair. Review Title: Travel Electric Toothbrush Case Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: FERYES Makeup Sponge Holder with Makeup Sponge– Eco-Friendly Silicone Beauty Make Up Blender Case and Dry & Wet Use Foundation Sponge for Travel - Khaki (MS Khaki) Review Date: 2021/10/27 Store: FERYES Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'FERYES', 'Color': '(MS Khaki)', 'Material': 'Silicone', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Makeup', 'Package Dimensions': '3.19 x 2.48 x 2.44 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'LEYIX', 'Country of Origin': 'China'} Review Text: One issue I've had in my makeup drawer is that I hate to just put my blender sponge in there without being inside something to keep it clean and sanitary. This solves that problem nicely. It's very soft and pliable and opens with a squeeze of the ends of the container. It's very easy to use and your sponge fits nicely inside. It seems quite durable and like it would last a good long time. It's also easy to clean and allows circulation in case you wash your sponge and it's slightly damp. The air holes will allow for proper circulation. This is a really handy gadget! Review Title: Makeup Sponge Holder Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Peripera Ink Mood Matte Lipstick, Lightweight, Matte, Smooth, Hydrating, Lasting Color Payoff (02 Pink Go Up) Review Date: 2021/11/10 Store: Peripera Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Peripera', 'Color': '02 PINK GO UP', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Item Form': 'Crayon', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Package Dimensions': '3.46 x 0.94 x 0.87 inches; 1.06 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'CLIO'} Review Text: I really love this color and the feel of this lipstick. I was impressed too with how pretty the packaging was. There's nothing nicer than when you take your lipstick out of your purse and everyone sees how pretty the tube is - but I digress. This lipstick is a great nude color and goes well with just about anything I wear - be it red or pink. You must always have a good versatile lipstick color in your purse at all times. Your clothes change but you always take the same purse when you're out and about. Your lipstick in that purse should go with everything you're wearing. The feel of this lipstick is also very nice which is a huge plus. I think the price is fair for such a nice quality lipstick. Review Title: Nice feel and Great Color Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: ANGNYA 6Pcs Nail Art Brushes Set Gel Nail Polish Design Pen Painting Tools With Nail Extension Gel Brushs,Builder Gel Brush,Nail Art Liner Brush for Salon at Home DIY Manicure(Pink) Review Date: 2021/12/22 Store: ANGNYA Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'ANGNYA', 'Head Material': 'Nylon', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '9.53 x 3.7 x 0.98 inches; 3.84 Ounces'} Review Text: This particular kit of nail art brushes had a good variety of different size brush heads. I've got other kits and they tend to all either be really thin or larger. This is a good kit to have because it's got a nice cross section of sizes to choose from. I wanted a particular size to make snowflakes on my nails with snow dots and I can do both designs with this one kit. I'm very happy with this section of brushes and the cost value too. Review Title: Great Variety of Sizes Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- Structure your response as: SUMMARY: [Final synthesis of preferences and patterns]
raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The individual's shopping behavior reveals a distinct preference for high-quality, natural, and effective personal care products, displaying a strong inclination towards eco-friendly and sustainable options. Ratings consistently indicate satisfaction, often scoring 4.0 or above, with multiple items receiving a 5.0 rating for performance and value.

Common themes in product selection include personal grooming (e.g., hair styling, skincare, and nail care), emphasizing soothing, moisturizing, and restorative qualities, particularly within beauty and self-care products. Natural ingredients, such as aloe vera, lavender, and calendula, frequently appear in their preferred offerings, indicating a desire for products that are gentle and safe for sensitive skin.

Price sensitivity is evident, as the shopper appreciates budget-friendly options but shows a willingness to invest in items that promise durability and superior quality. This trend is notably found in reusable or multifunctional products, suggesting a focus on practicality and value.

In conclusion, the core preferences reflect a commitment to quality, natural ingredients, and functionality, with a particular affinity for products that enhance personal wellness while being mindful of environmental impact.

target_interaction.title: The perfect bit of shine to add to your lips
target_interaction.text: I love this trio of lipgloss. The flavors are very popular fragrances of strawberry, grape, and bubblegum. The strawberry and the grape do appear to be slightly tinted, but you will not notice any real color added to your lips from them. You can use them alone and enjoy just a nice clear gloss over your natural color lips, or you can put it over top of your color and no worry of changing the color of your favorite lipstick. It will add a very nice bit of shine and a little bit of a sparkle to whatever color you decide to slide it over.  I do not notice a lot of flavor to these glosses, but the color is very pretty. I feel that the box is a nice addition if you plan on giving these as a gift. I think this would make a wonderful gift for a young girl or even an older lady. I can’t imagine anybody that wouldn’t enjoy receiving this trio of lip glosses. I felt the price was extremely fair and that the quality of this item was very good.
target_interaction.title_meta: Kopari Bubblegum Lip Gloss Kit | Strawberry, Grape, and Bubble Gum Flavors | Hydrating Blend of Shea Butter and Coconut Oil to Nourish and Soothe Chapped Lips | Vegan and Cruelty-Free
features: Bubble Gum Lip Kit is infused with three bubblicious flavors including Strawberry, Grape, and Bubble Gum for lusciously hydrated lips.
Ultra hydrating and non-sticky, these glossies will give your lips the perfect amount of shine. Say bye to dry lips and hello to luscious hydration.
Formulated with Shea Butter, Squalene, and Organic Coconut Oil these glossies deeply moisturize, smooth, and leave your lips smelling delicious!
Gently squeeze the tube and glide on your favorite Lip Glossy for the perfect amount of shine.

Made In The USA: Kopari skin care products are manufactured using only the best ingredients and made with love in sustainable, solar powered labs in Southern California. All products are proudly non GMO, sulfate free, cruelty free and paraben free.
